data.actual_result: Sometimes, while the animation is occurring, visual glitches will occur: guild list, header, and channel message textarea can appear over the settings window, but disappears when the animation completes
data.expected_result: User Settings will open without any visual glitches
data.short_description: Guild list/visual artifacts will appear on top of the settings window when spam opening User Settings with hotkey
data.steps_to_repro: - Press the user settings button. - Very fast leave the user settings modal by hitting ESC.
